author: DWillWest "Utah Buckeye"

review: Pros:-Size & portabilityCons:-Needs a WiFi connection to work-Doesn't have a built-in media player. All playback is app dependent. The Chromecast app is only used for syncing.-Significant lag. Even viewing a picture slideshow (which you need to find an app to do) is a chore because of the lag.-You need to find/buy another app to play content on your device.-Most hotels block HDMI input now as a "security measure". I hoped to use it while travelling and have no been able to.I basically use it as a last-resort media player. When I'm somewhere with good Wifi and no other way to watch video and doesn't block HDMI input. I rarely use this thing.
